search.query: $dma_search|s$

fields label, status, last_heartbeat, last_heartbeat_captain | join label type=outer [ | rest splunk_server_group="$group$" splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/configs/conf-server/shclustering | fields splunk_server, heartbeat_timeout | rename splunk_server as label ] | where status != "Up" OR (last_heartbeat_captain - last_heartbeat) > heartbeat_timeout

condition.set: There are members in this cluster that do not have a healthy heartbeat status.
All members in this cluster have a healthy heartbeat status.

search.query: | rest splunk_server_group="$group$" splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/search/distributed/peers | fields splunk_server, peerName | stats values(peerName) as peers by splunk_server | nomv peers | stats values(splunk_server) AS search_heads by peers | makemv peers | fields search_heads peers | rename search_heads as "Search Head Cluster Member", peers as "Search Peer List"

condition.set: The list of distributed search peers is inconsistent among cluster members. This could result in inconsistent search results within the search head cluster.

search.query: where total_no_shared_common_baseline+total_unable_to_connect > 0

condition.set: There are members in this cluster that do not share a common baseline. Action may be required.
All members in this cluster share a common baseline.

search.query: | rest splunk_server_group="$group$" splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/server/status/resource-usage/splunk-processes | search search_props.role="head" | dedup search_props.sid

stats count(eval(('search_props.type'=="scheduled" OR 'search_props.type'=="summary indexing" OR 'search_props.type'=="report acceleration" OR 'search_props.type'=="datamodel acceleration" OR 'search_props.type'=="ad-hoc") AND ('search_props.mode'=="historical" OR 'search_props.mode'=="historical batch"))) as count_total_hist, count(eval(('search_props.type'=="scheduled" OR 'search_props.type'=="summary indexing" OR 'search_props.type'=="report acceleration" OR 'search_props.type'=="datamodel acceleration" OR 'search_props.type'=="ad-hoc") AND ('search_props.mode'=="RT" OR 'search_props.mode'=="RT indexed"))) as count_total_rt, count(eval(('search_props.type'=="scheduled" OR 'search_props.type'=="summary indexing" OR 'search_props.type'=="report acceleration" OR 'search_props.type'=="datamodel acceleration") AND ('search_props.mode'=="historical" OR 'search_props.mode'=="historical batch"))) as count_hist_scheduled_search, count(eval(('search_props.type'=="scheduled" OR 'search_props.type'=="summary indexing" OR 'search_props.type'=="report acceleration" OR 'search_props.type'=="datamodel acceleration") AND ('search_props.mode'=="RT" OR 'search_props.mode'=="RT indexed"))) as count_rt_scheduled_search, count(eval(('search_props.type'=="report acceleration" OR 'search_props.type'=="datamodel acceleration"))) as count_auto_summary_search | eval count_total_adhoc_scheduled_search = count_total_hist + count_total_rt | eval count_total_scheduled_search = count_hist_scheduled_search + count_rt_scheduled_search | eval dummy_key = "dummy_key" | fields count_total_hist, count_hist_scheduled_search, count_total_rt, count_rt_scheduled_search, count_auto_summary_search, count_total_adhoc_scheduled_search, count_total_scheduled_search, dummy_key | join dummy_key type=outer [ | rest splunk_server_group="$group$" splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head "/services/server/status/limits/search-concurrency?cluster_wide_quota=1" | stats max(max_hist_searches) as max_hist_searches, max(max_hist_scheduled_searches) as max_hist_scheduled_searches, max(max_rt_searches), as max_rt_searches, max(max_rt_scheduled_searches) as max_rt_scheduled_searches, max(max_auto_summary_searches) as max_auto_summary_searches | eval dummy_key = "dummy_key" | fields max_hist_searches, max_hist_scheduled_searches, max_rt_searches, max_rt_scheduled_searches, max_auto_summary_searches, dummy_key ]

`dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group=dmc_group_search_head search_group="$group$" sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage ((component=PerProcess data.search_props.sid::*) OR component=Hostwide) | `dmc_rename_introspection_fields` | `dmc_set_bin` | stats dc(sid) AS distinct_search_count by provenance, mode, app, type, user, host, _time
`dmc_set_index_internal` search_group="$group$" sourcetype=splunkd component=Metrics group=captainstability upgrades_to_captain=1 | stats count by _time, upgrades_to_captain, host
| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/shcluster/captain/info | dedup peer_scheme_host_port | fields label

| rest splunk_server=local /services/search/distributed/peers | where search_groups="$group$" AND server_roles="search_head" | eval label = host | join guid type=outer [ | rest splunk_server_group="$group$" splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/shcluster/member/members count=0 | dedup label | eval guid = title ] | join label type=outer [ | rest splunk_server=$captain_name$ /services/shcluster/captain/members count=0 | where splunk_server == label | fields label, last_heartbeat | rename last_heartbeat as last_heartbeat_captain ] | eventstats values(last_heartbeat_captain) as last_heartbeat_captain | join label type=outer [ | rest splunk_server_group="$group$" splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/shcluster/captain/info | where splunk_server == label | eval age = now() - elected_captain | eval captain_age = case(age < 60, "< 1m", age >= 60 AND age < 3600, round(age / 60, 0)."m", age >= 3600 AND age < 86400, round(age / 3600, 0)."h", age >= 86400, round(age / 86400, 0)."d") | `dmc_time_format(elected_captain)` | eval role = "Captain (" . captain_age . ")" | fields label captain_age elected_captain role ] | join label type=outer [ | rest /services/replication/configuration/health check_share_baseline=1 splunk_server_group="$group$" splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head | stats values(server_name) as baselines, count(server_name) as num_baselines by splunk_server, check_share_baseline | eval shared_common_baseline = if(check_share_baseline == "Yes", baselines, "") | eval no_shared_common_baseline = if(check_share_baseline == "No", baselines, "") | eval unable_to_connect = if(check_share_baseline == "Connection error", baselines, "") | eval num_shared_common_baseline = if(check_share_baseline == "Yes", num_baselines, 0) | eval num_no_shared_common_baseline = if(check_share_baseline == "No", num_baselines, 0) | eval num_unable_to_connect = if(check_share_baseline == "Connection error", num_baselines, 0) | stats sum(num_shared_common_baseline) as total_shared_common_baseline, sum(num_no_shared_common_baseline) as total_no_shared_common_baseline, sum(num_unable_to_connect) as total_unable_to_connect, values(shared_common_baseline) as shared_common_baseline, values(no_shared_common_baseline) as no_shared_common_baseline, values(unable_to_connect) as unable_to_connect by splunk_server | eval ratio = total_shared_common_baseline . "/" . (total_shared_common_baseline+total_no_shared_common_baseline+total_unable_to_connect) | rename splunk_server as label ] | join label type=outer [ | rest /services/replication/configuration/health unpublished=1 splunk_server_group="$group$" splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head | rename "Number of unpublished changes" as unpublished_changes | eval unpublished_changes=if(unpublished_changes=="0 (this instance is the captain)", 0, unpublished_changes) | rename splunk_server as label ] | eval role = if(isnotnull(role), role, "Member") | sort role

index=_internal search_group=$group$ search_group=dmc_group_search_head source=*splunkd.log* component=*distributed* log_level!=INFO | rex "\d{2}\-\d{2}\-\d{4}\s+\d{2}\:\d{2}\:\d{2}\.\d{3}\s+\S+\s+\w+\s+\w+(?<msg>.+)" | stats count by host component log_level msg | sort -count

html.p: Click any row above to see timechart

search.query: index=_internal search_group=$group$ search_group=dmc_group_search_head source=*splunkd.log* component=*distributed* log_level!=INFO | timechart $span$ count by host useother=f limit=0

html.p: Click any host to see timechart

panel.title: distributed search warnings and errors for $host1$

search.query: index=_internal search_group=$group$ search_group=dmc_group_search_head host=$host1$ source=*splunkd.log* component=*distributed* log_level!=INFO | rex "\d{2}\-\d{2}\-\d{4}\s+\d{2}\:\d{2}\:\d{2}\.\d{3}\s+\S+\s+\w+\s+\w+(?<msg>.+)" | eval host_msg=host.":::".msg | timechart $span$ count by host_msg useother=f limit=0

fields label role status
| rename label as Instance, role as Role, status as Status

panel.title: Distributed Peer Heartbeat - Peer Count per SH (SH heartbeats peers every 5m)

search.query: index=_internal search_group=$group$ search_group=dmc_group_search_head source=*metrics.log* group=search_health_metrics name=distributed_peer_heartbeat | timechart span=5m max(Peer_Count) as peer_count by host limit=0

| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/search/distributed/peers | fields splunk_server, peerName | stats list(peerName) as peers dc(peerName) as peerCount by splunk_server

| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/search/distributed/bundle-replication-files | convert ctime(timestamp) as timestamp| eval sizeMB= round(size/1024/1024,2) | table splunk_server filename location size sizeMB timestamp title| rename splunk_server as "shc_captain" title as "bundle version" | join shc_captain [| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/configs/conf-distsearch | search maxBundleSize=* | table splunk_server maxBundleSize | rename splunk_server as shc_captain maxBundleSize as "maxBundleSize (distsearch.conf)"] | join shc_captain [| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/shcluster/captain/info | dedup peer_scheme_host_port | fields label | rename label as "shc_captain"] | sort -timestamp

panel.title: SHC captain ($captain_name$) view of bundle versions on each peer

search.query: | rest splunk_server=* /services/search/distributed/peers | rex field=bundle_isIndexing "\w\s-\s(?<truefalse>\w+)" | stats values(bundle_versions) as "bundle version" dc(bundle_versions) as "bundle versions on indexer" by splunk_server host status version guid | rename version as "indexer version" guid as "indexer guid" splunk_server as shc_captain host as indexer | join shc_captain [| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/shcluster/captain/info | dedup peer_scheme_host_port | fields label | rename label as "shc_captain"]

panel.title: peer side knowledge bundle receive msgs

search.query: index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" source=*splunkd_access.log* *bundle* method=POST /services/receivers/bundle* | rex "\/services\/receivers\/(?<type>\S+)\/(?<SH_id>\S+)\s+HTTP" | table _time host method type SH_id bytes spent clientip status | dedup SH_id | table SH_id

index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" source=*splunkd_access.log* *bundle* method=POST /services/receivers/bundle* | rex "\/services\/receivers\/(?<type>\S+)\/(?<SH_id>\S+)\s+HTTP" | search SH_id="$SH_id$" | table _time host method type SH_id bytes spent clientip status

panel.title: timechart peer side knowledge bundle receive msgs

search.query: index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" source=*splunkd_access.log* *bundle* method=POST /services/receivers/bundle* | rex "\/services\/receivers\/(?<type>\S+)\/(?<SH_id>\S+)\s+HTTP" | search SH_id="$SH_id$" | eval type_SH=SH_id."::".type | timechart dc(SH_id) by type_SH limit=0

panel.title: How much space do my search bundles take up on the indexer?

input.label: number of knowledge bundles residing on peer (typically 5-10 per SH/SHC id)

search.query: | rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/search/distributed/bundle-replication-files | stats max(size) as max_full_bundle_size by splunk_server | eval bundles_on_peer=$bundle_count$ | eval agg_bundle_size_demand_on_peer=max_full_bundle_size*bundles_on_peer*2 | eval agg_bundle_size_demand_on_peerMB= round(agg_bundle_size_demand_on_peer/1024/1024,2) | table splunk_server max_full_bundle_size bundles_on_peer agg_bundle_size_demand_on_peerMB | rename splunk_server as shc_captain | join shc_captain [| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/shcluster/captain/info | dedup peer_scheme_host_port | fields label | rename label as "shc_captain"]

panel.title: lookup files which are configured for automatic lookups (don't blacklist these from the knowledge bundle)

search.query: | rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/configs/conf-transforms | search filename=*| table splunk_server eai:acl.app title filename id | rename eai:acl.app as app title as stanza splunk_server as shc_captain | join shc_captain [| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/shcluster/captain/info | dedup peer_scheme_host_port | fields label | rename label as "shc_captain"]

panel.title: Datamodel searches which contain lookups (don't blacklist these lookups from the knowledge bundle)

search.query: | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_searchheadclustergroup_shcluster1_new /services/datamodel/acceleration| fields title search | eval contains_lookup=if(like(search, "%lookup%"),1,0) | eval contains_lookup=case(contains_lookup=1,"yes",contains_lookup=0,"no")| table title search contains_lookup | search contains_lookup=yes

panel.title: macros which include lookups (need to use macro stanza name to search DM searches)

search.query:
| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_searchheadclustergroup_shcluster1_new splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/configs/conf-macros | search definition=*lookup* | table splunk_server eai:acl.app title definition | rename eai:acl.app as app title as stanza splunk_server as shc_captain
| join shc_captain [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_searchheadclustergroup_shcluster1_new splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/shcluster/captain/info | dedup peer_scheme_host_port | fields label | rename label as "shc_captain"]

| rest splunk_server_group=$group$ splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /services/configs/conf-distsearch | fields *Timeout* splunk_server title id | search title=distributedSearch OR title=replicationSettings | table splunk_server title *Timeout* | rename title as stanza | sort -splunk_server

panel.title: Datamodel Acceleration Searches (does this endpoint only return DMAs in the search app? )

search.query: | rest splunk_server=$captain_name$ /services/datamodel/acceleration | fields title eai:acl.app search | rename eai:acl.app as app

panel.title: paste DMA search into dma_search box above to execute and produce the optimizedSearch to see if any lookups are present

search.query: | makeresults | eval optimizedSearch=($optimizedSearch|s$) | eval contains_lookup=if(like(optimizedSearch, "%lookup%"),1,0) | eval contains_lookup=case(contains_lookup=1,"yes",contains_lookup=0,"no")| table optimizedSearch contains_lookup
